Directions: Read the information below and use it to answer each question that follows.
Context: The following section focuses on solutions to address flooding problems on a sports field.
Content: At a school, a sports field became flooded following a large rainstorm. Students were unable to play on the field for several days while the water slowly absorbed into the ground. To better predict when a rainstorm might flood the field, a group of students gathered the seasonal climate data shown in the table.
The students designed two possible solutions to the flooding problem. The diagrams show the features of each design solution.
